make_directory( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/actual )

# make sure 'sra-2-fastq -h' does not crash
add_test( NAME Test_Sra_2_Fastq_Help
    COMMAND ${DIRTOTEST}/sra-2-fastq -h >actual/Test_Sra_2_Fastq_Help.stdout
    WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} )

### command line checking:
function( AddCmdlineFailureTest test_name )
    add_test( NAME ${test_name}
        COMMAND ${DIRTOTEST}/sra-2-fastq ${ARGN}
        WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} )
    set_tests_properties(${test_name} PROPERTIES WILL_FAIL TRUE)
endfunction()
